bibl.title: A Market Economy in the Early Roman Empire.
bibl.note: "Recent evidence indicates that M.I. Finley [The Ancient Economy = Sather Classical Lectures. 43 (Berkeley, 1973) pp. 22-23] was wrong; ancient Rome had an economic system that was an enormous conglomeration of interdependent markets."
bibl.seg: TEMIN Peter, A Market Economy in the Early Roman Empire.

"Recent evidence indicates that M.I. Finley [The Ancient Economy = Sather Classical Lectures. 43 (Berkeley, 1973) pp. 22-23] was wrong; ancient Rome had an economic system that was an enormous conglomeration of interdependent markets."
